events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and all documents are complete.
The candidate's profile was reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to extensive developer experience.
Recruiter Alex has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s recruitment process for the software engineer role.
The initial screening call was conducted, and the candidate demonstrated solid knowledge of software development principles.
Candidate responded promptly to scheduling requests and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10 AM to assess coding and problem-solving skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing strong proficiency in algorithms and system design.
HR interview is arranged for May 7th to discuss cultural fit, salary expectations, and company policies.
HR interview went well; candidate aligned with company values and demonstrated clear interest in the role.
An offer was proposed to the candidate including competitive compensation and benefits aligned with expectations.
The candidate expressed enthusiasm about the offer and asked a few questions regarding development tools.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed their start date for onboarding.
The onboarding process has started, and the new software engineer has been introduced to the team and tools.
The hiring process is now complete and the candidate has successfully integrated as a new software engineer.
